com.djammr.westernknights.screens

Class ScreenManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.djammr.westernknights.screens.ScreenManager

  • public class ScreenManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Screen Manager/Pooler, for easily caching and loading screens with automatic loading screen support.
    Call game.getScreens().setScreen(name) to change screens

    • Method Detail

      • setScreen

        public void setScreen(java.lang.String screen)
        Changes the game screen to the requested screen
        Parameters:
        screen - Name of the registered screen

      • addScreen

        public void addScreen(java.lang.String ID,
             WKScreen screen)
        Register and cache a screen for setting later
        Parameters:
        ID - name/ID for the screen (needed to retrieve it later)
        screen - the ZbeScreen instance

      • removeScreen

        public void removeScreen(java.lang.String screen)
        Disposes and removes a registered screen from this manager. Use when you no longer want to cache a screen.
        Parameters:
        screen - the name of the screen to dispose and remove

      • dispose

        public void dispose()

      • getScreen

        public WKScreen getScreen()
        Returns:
        currently set ZbeScreen instance

      • getPrevScreenID

        public java.lang.String getPrevScreenID()
        Returns:
        ID/Name of the previous screen

      • getCurrentScreenID

        public java.lang.String getCurrentScreenID()
        Returns:
        ID/Name of the current screen
